t: Pebbles (cereal) - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Pebbles is a brand of breakfast cereal which was introduced in the United States by Post Consumer Brands on October 20, 1971 featuring characters from the animated series The Flintstones as spokestoons. The product line includes Cocoa Pebbles and Fruity Pebbles.
